column4: If I install a 64bit system, will I get any advantage being a normal desktop user? Something will be faster?
go with 32 bit... you'll be running with the big herd.. things will be smoother and so on.. use 64 bit when you make a new install of ubuntu 11.04 or something =)
I run both.. I've tried both on the same machine.. I doubt I would be able to tell if I was running 32bit or 64bit
